product_name: Wigwam Ironman Flash Pro Running Socks
long_description: Accomplish the extraordinary without worrying about your feet in these Ironman(R) Flash Pro socks from Wigwam. Pro-rated and patented moisture control system keeps feet cool, dry and protected from blisters. Nylon/acrylic blend has a dash of spandex for a foot-hugging fit. Mesh insteps promote breathability. Foot-hugging fit moves with your feet to provide support and balance inside your shoes. Virtually seamless toes eliminate pressure points and friction areas. Tab backs aid entry for a quick swim to bike transition and also keep socks from slipping down heels. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Accomplish the extraordinary without worrying about your feet in these Ironman(R) Flash Pro socks from Wigwam.
